libshapedraw.shape

Class WireframeShape

  • java.lang.Object
    • libshapedraw.shape.Shape
      • libshapedraw.shape.WireframeShape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XrayShape
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WireframeCuboid, WireframeLine, WireframeLines

    public abstract class WireframeShape
extends Shape
implements XrayShape
    Intermediate base class for shapes that are rendered using lines.

      • renderLines

        protected void renderLines(MinecraftAccess mc,
               boolean isSecondary)
        Using the MinecraftAccess param, interact with the Tessellator to draw vertices. The line depth function/width/color has already been set up.
